services.title: AI products designed to be used

audit.title: AI Audit
audit.description: Analysis of your needs and identification of AI automation opportunities.

prototype.title: Rapid Prototype
prototype.description: Development of a functional MVP in 2-4 weeks to validate the concept.

deployment.title: Deployment & Support
deployment.description: Secure production deployment and continuous support.

method.title: Our method
method.step1_desc: 1-2 day workshop to understand your challenges, define objectives and validate technical feasibility.
method.step2_desc: Iterative development of a functional prototype with regular feedback. Goal: validate real usage.
method.step3_desc: Production deployment with monitoring, team training and continuous optimization based on metrics.

about.title: Useful AI, simple experience
about.subtitle: We help companies create AI-powered products that are actually used.
about.story_p1: Hitom was born from a simple observation: too many AI projects fail not from lack of technology, but from lack of focus on real usage.
about.story_p2: Our mission is to create AI experiences that integrate naturally into users' daily lives, without a learning curve, without frustration.
about.story_p3: We combine technical expertise and UX approach to transform complex use cases into simple and effective interfaces.
about.value1_desc: We create AI solutions that solve real problems, not technological gadgets.
about.value2_desc: Effective AI is AI that is understood and used without friction.
about.value3_desc: Each project is accompanied by clear metrics to measure its ROI.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Have a project? A question? We're here to help.
contact.booking_desc: Book a 30-minute slot to discuss your project.
contact.cta_subtitle: Let's discuss your project during a free 30-minute initial exchange.

pricing.title: Pricing & Offers
pricing.subtitle: Tailored solutions for your needs, from proof of concept to long-term partnership

poc_express.name: AI POC Express
poc_express.description: Functional prototype of an app or mini SaaS integrating AI (Claude, OpenAI, Mistral, etc.) with clean UX interface and testable business logic. Ideal for validating an idea or convincing an investor.

full_experience.name: Complete AI Experience
full_experience.description: Creation of a complete experience: UX + UI + AI integration + automations (n8n, APIs, smart forms). Recommended for startups or internal services.

partnership.name: Design+AI Partnership
partnership.description: Monthly support: UX optimizations, new AI modules, continuous redesigns. Long-term collaboration.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about my approach and services
faq.q1: Do you only do AI, or do you also support design and user experience?
faq.a1:
No, I don't just do AI.

AI is just one lever among others in my global approach: UX, UI, API integration, automation, and performance.

My role is to create complete experiences ‚Äî where AI naturally blends into the user journey to make it smoother, smarter, and more profitable.

üëâ In short: I design useful products, not AI demos.
faq.q2: What are your rates and what do they specifically include?
faq.a2:
Each offer is packaged around a result, not a number of hours.

You choose a format (POC, complete experience, or support), and everything is included:

‚Ä¢ UX/UI design
‚Ä¢ AI integration (Claude, Mistral, OpenAI‚Ä¶)
‚Ä¢ Automations and connectors (n8n, APIs, smart forms)
‚Ä¢ Documentation and transfer

No hidden fees, no surprise billing ‚Äî just a measurable deliverable.
faq.q3: How long does it take to deliver a project, and how do you handle technical setbacks?
faq.a3:
An express POC: 7 to 14 days.

A complete project: 3 to 6 weeks, broken down into short sprints (1 to 2 weeks).

Each mission starts with precise scoping to avoid gray areas.

In case of unforeseen issues (APIs, data, external dependencies), I always plan a backup to never block delivery.

My approach: fast, agile, but always structured.
faq.q4: What about after delivery? Do you offer maintenance or follow-up?
faq.a4:
Yes ‚Äî each project is delivered clean and documented, but I also offer:

‚Ä¢ An evolving maintenance contract (updates, fixes, new AI/UX features)
‚Ä¢ Monthly support to grow your product

You keep control of your code and infrastructure, I remain in technical or strategic support according to your needs.

The goal: for your product to live long and stay performant.
faq.q5: How do I know if my idea or project is ready to work with you?
faq.a5:
Even if your idea isn't fully defined yet, we can move forward.

I offer a quick scoping workshop to clarify your need, identify the right level of automation, and validate AI feasibility.

We can then decide:

‚Ä¢ Either to do a quick POC to test the concept
‚Ä¢ Or to directly build a complete experience

The important thing is to start small, prove, then scale ‚Äî not wait for perfection.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.what_is_cookie_desc: A cookie is a small text file placed on your device when visiting a website. It allows storing information about your browsing.
cookies.essential_desc: These cookies are essential for the site to function. They do not require consent.
cookies.analytics_desc: These cookies help us understand how you use our site.
cookies.management_desc: You can modify your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the "Manage my cookies" button at the bottom of the page, or through your browser settings.
cookies.consent_desc: In accordance with GDPR and ePrivacy Directive, we use Axeptio to collect your consent before placing non-essential cookies.
cookies.consent_withdrawal: You can withdraw your consent at any time without affecting the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal.
